[
    Expression {
        expression: FunctionCall {
            target: Identifier(
                SimpleIdentifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            1,
                        ),
                        value: "foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            arguments: ArgumentList {
                start: Span(
                    3,
                    4,
                ),
                arguments: [
                    Positional {
                        ellipsis: None,
                        value: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        3,
                                        5,
                                    ),
                                    name: "a",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                    Positional {
                        ellipsis: None,
                        value: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        3,
                                        9,
                                    ),
                                    name: "b",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                    Positional {
                        ellipsis: None,
                        value: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        3,
                                        13,
                                    ),
                                    name: "c",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                    Positional {
                        ellipsis: Some(
                            Span(
                                3,
                                17,
                            ),
                        ),
                        value: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        3,
                                        20,
                                    ),
                                    name: "d",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    },
                ],
                end: Span(
                    3,
                    22,
                ),
            },
        },
        end: Span(
            3,

        ),
    },
]
